p: To the Sheriff of said County Greeting

We command you to attach Rolla Rose if he may be found within your baileveok and bring him before the Judge of Am Circuit Court at the City of St Louis within and for the County of St Louis on Monday the ninth day of May Instant then and there to answer unto the State of Missouri touching a certain contempt by him committed in not obey -ing a writ of Habeas Corpus to him directed and have you then there this unit
Witness Archibald Gamble Clerk of am said Court at offices this 7th day of May 1825
